Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Ever since becoming a Construct, Shome has not been sleeping well.'}
{3: 'Constructs do not require sleep, but pretending to be asleep helps Shome think.'}
{3: 'That used to be the case for Shome, but ever since becoming a Construct, he has not been sleeping well.'}
{3: 'You are no longer needed. We have everything under control.'}
{3: 'You are no longer protected. Your protector is no longer of this world.'}
{3: 'You are no longer blessed. We will soon reach the light.'}
{3: 'This, is your end.'}
{3: 'You are no longer needed.'}
{3: 'We do not wish for you to be remembered.'}
{3: 'You must disappear.'}
{3: 'You have no worth. You are disposable. You are replaceable.'}
{3: 'And so—You shall not exist.'}
{3: 'You are not "necessary." We can remove you easily.'}
{3: 'Accept your fate. Accept your tragedy.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory37.jpg'}
{3: 'The light from the bulb is the color of a waning sun, alighting the cave with darkness.'}
{3: 'A certain day in the Post-Pandemic Age'}
{3: 'Several dozen people are hard at work before their terminals, fingers all a blur on their keyboards.'}
{3: 'After a long while, one person finally pauses his work and stands up. He walks toward a young man, whose eyes are intent on the screen in the middle of the cave.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: "Mr. Shome? We've dug past Babylonia's firewalls. We have access to the Operation Acadia files.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: '...I refuse.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Mr. Shome?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'Hm? What is it?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: "Mr. Shome? We've dug past Babylonia's firewalls. We have access to the Operation Acadia files.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "Go look for the magnet links I've posted on the memos in the morning meeting."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Understood. It shows that there are 2,022 blocks of data tied to those links.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'Grab the ten with the highest authority level and send them to the terminal in my office.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Please wait...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'Good.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'With this done, you are all dismissed.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "In the Godfather's stead, I announce that—your duty has been fulfilled."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: 'T-thank you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'No. It should be the Godfather and I thanking you.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "L'unione fa la forza."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher', 3: "Grazie! L'unione fa la forza!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The researchers begin packing up their personal belongings...'}
{3: 'While Shome saunters into his office, locking himself within.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'You are no longer needed. We have everything under control.'}
{3: 'You are no longer protected. Your protector can no longer protect you.'}
{3: 'You are no longer blessed. The lightless abyss awaits you.'}
{3: 'This, is your end.'}
{3: 'You are no longer needed.'}
{3: 'I do not wish for you to be remembered.'}
{3: 'You have no worth. You are a scoundrel, unworthy of even pity.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{2: 'News', 3: '"In this tragic accident... Several thousands have lost their lives..."'}
{2: 'News', 3: '"The World Government has announced that it will not terminate the operation, but would carry it out with greater concern for safety and..."'}
{2: 'News', 3: '"The terrorist groups involved in this incident are currently wanted by the World Government..."'}
{2: 'News', 3: '"At the same time, should anyone know where the missing airman Cyril might be, please provide information to..."'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'There are others doing the same thing. This will help cover us up.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'I highly doubt that this is a coincidence. Is it your work, Godfather?'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'So what if? So what if not?'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'I just happened to provide the right thing to the right people, at the right time.'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'And it turned out right. That is all.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: 'Could you please tell me. What is the right ending for me?'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'That, I cannot say.'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'I once had a child who I thought I could entrust with my scepter.'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'But sadly, he seems to be getting ready to take flight to the "skies above."'}
{3: "Shome's soft fists clench up."}
{3: "Seeing Shome's reaction, the Godfather adds."}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: "If you'd also like a ride up, I can make arrangements."}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'With a different way than his.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "...That won't be necessary."}
{2: 'Shome', 3: "I'm not interested in mingling with those recreants."}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'Hmm?'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'We think the same.'}
{2: 'Shome', 3: '...Do you truly?'}
{2: 'Godfather', 3: 'Well. What do you think?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory42.jpg'}
{3: 'Faraway explosions stir Shome awake from his daze of dreams and memories.'}
{3: "Two o'clock position. The explosions came from a minefield of anti-tank mines and anti-personnel mines."}
{3: 'Shome knows not to place too much hope on the trap. After all, his enemies can hop and prance around if they are shelled by a tank.'}
{3: 'The scavenger settlements that took him in were all removed from the face of the earth—the enemy is determined to destroy him.'}
{3: 'He had only settled in this shelter for less than four days. And now, they have already found him.'}
{3: '——That place. That place is the only hope.'}
{3: 'Shome opens the hatch to the emergency escape shaft and crawls in.'}
